-e ---

𒍏 URUD ⋍ 𔔣 #argentum
𒍏 URUD uruda #erûˢ Erz 𓋹 (copperz) 𓉻 𓏏 𓊌 / 𓌇 / 𓌈 / 𓍄
𒍐 URUDU red-copper-rod 𓈘 𓈐 ⇔ pure bar 𒁇
𒄢 SI/GUL ⇔ silver/gold/sick

𒍏 ᵇURUD •burũds bronze ≈ brand in 𒍏 𒋛𒅎𒁕 SI-IM-DAˡ brand symbol 𒍏 𒋛𒅎𒁕 QA-IM-DA chamizo "brand, branding mark" (𒋛 qarnu ᶜHorn)

𒍏 ≈ 𒄑 in 𒍏𒆕 ≈ 𒄑𒆕 šukur spear ( Erz / wood )

𒍏+𒆬=𒍐 (𒆬>𒌋)

𒀜𒄬 ʳad-hal ރަތުލޯ ratulō ≈ 𒍏 URUDUˡ "copper" 𒀜𒄬 ᵖad-hał пӑхӑр păh̬ăr "copper" 𒀜 𒄬 adhal't 𐎘𐎍𐎘 ṯlṯ tiłt "copper"

  1. 𒍏𒂆 urud.gín : 𓋹 Kupfer Beil 𓈔𓈕

𓅙𓃀𓏏𓊌 Bunt Metalle (bronzen slabs bars...)

𒎁𒁇/𒆉𒁇 zabar≠silber 𒁇bar…za bronze bar (alwayse reverse)
𒌓/𒄞𒅗𒁇 ⇔ 𒍏𒍐 𓅙𓃀𓏏𓊌

𒍏 da₅ DAB ⇔ 𒁾 DUB 𒂉𒂉 𒁳
